page.title: 06THE NAUTICAL COLLEGE,F/WOOD
page.content: The College was established in{1892. {1935}the School expanded, offering courses for foreign & home trade certificates of competency.In{1962}a new building was designed as a Radar Training Station.In{1964}work began on courses for Marine Radio Officers. In{1965}all the old departments moved into the new Nautical College, which was officially opened in{1967. There is a Hall of Residence containg common rooms, offices, 88 study bedrooms & a laundry.Recreation facilities were completed in{1978.}In {1980}it acquired an Advanced Marine Radar Simulator complete with Auto- matic Radar Plotting Aids.There are 5 similar Colleges.It is compulsary for those on Marine Deck,Fishing & Merch- ant Service Courses to go to sea.There are 3100 pupils,2000 of whom,are part- time.Approximately 150 are female.
